Literature.Title: Simplified Head-to-Tail Cyclic Polypeptides as Biomaterial-Associated Antimicrobials With Endotoxin Neutralizing and Anti-Inflammatory Capabilities
Literature.Author: Dong N, Wang C, Li X, Guo Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>128µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
